name: Laruaville 7
description:
The Ghosts set out to unravel the mysteries of the ancient Egypt. During the expedition they awakened the ghost of Pharaoh that was sleeping for the last 5000 years. Now they can reveal how ancient Egypt really looked like first-hand.

Game features:

- New bonus match 3 levels including playing with an opponent and high difficulty puzzle levels
- Hidden Objects, Find The Difference scenes and Solitaire deals!
- Discover the true Ancient Egypt!
